QO.notes: QO load centers/panels accept QO family breakers. Do not mix with Homeline (HOM).

Homeline.notes: Homeline load centers accept HOM breakers. Do not mix with QO.

QP.notes: Siemens QP family fits compatible Siemens load centers.

BR.notes: Eaton BR load centers accept BR-frame breakers.

CH.notes: Eaton CH load centers accept CH-frame breakers.

THQL.notes: GE THQL/THQP breakers for compatible GE panels.

Smart.notes: Leviton smart breakers for Leviton smart load centers.

nema_enclosures.1: Indoor, general purpose. No protection against moisture.
nema_enclosures.3R: Outdoor rainproof. Protects against falling rain and sleet.
nema_enclosures.4X: Like NEMA 4 with additional corrosion resistance (stainless/fiberglass).

ev_charger_rules.note: Continuous load sizing: branch-circuit rating should be >= 125% of EVSE output current per NEC 625.41/210.20(A). Verify locally.

disclaimer: This tool is an aid only. Always verify with manufacturer documentation and local codes. Do not mix brands/series unless listed for the panel.
